meanings.definition: Incorrectly attributed to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The misattributed painting was mistakenly thought to be created by a famous artist.
meanings.sent2: The misattributed quote was actually said by a different historical figure.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a misattributed mix-up when the wrong author was credited for the best-selling book.
meanings.sent4: The misattributed song lyrics seemed to belong to a different singer altogether.
meanings.sent5: The misattributed signature on the document led to confusion about its true owner.

meanings.definition: Wrongly assigned to a particular source or origin.
meanings.sent1: The misattributed article was mistakenly credited to the wrong journalist.
meanings.sent2: The misattributed blame fell on the innocent party instead of the true culprit.
meanings.sent3: It was a misattributed error to assume the wrong person was responsible for the success.
meanings.sent4: The misattributed scent made it seem like the bakery was nearby when it was actually a perfume shop.
meanings.sent5: The misattributed voice on the phone turned out to be a recorded message, not a real person.
